sanskrit_verse:
लोकानां तु विवृद्ध्यर्थं मुखबाहूरुपादतः ।
ब्राह्मणं क्षत्रियं वैश्यं शूद्रं च निरवर्तयत् ॥ १.३१॥
transliteration:
lokānāṃ tu vivṛddhyarthaṃ mukhabāhūrupādataḥ |
brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ ca niravartayat || 1.31||
sph_interpretive_translation: For the expansion and sustenance of all worlds, from His own Mouth, Arms, Thighs, and Feet, Paramashivam manifested the Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaishya, and Shudra.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates solely from Paramashivam as the Source of all order
Causation is rooted in divine manifestation, not social contract or historical evolution
Capacity-based responsibility flows from ontological origin, not birth alone
Restoration logic aligns individual roles with cosmic function as originally ordained
Consciousness alignment requires recognition of one's source in Paramashivam
executable_legal_axioms: IF a being manifests consciousness of Brahmana capacity THEN assign Veda-preserving duties
IF a being manifests consciousness of Kshatriya capacity THEN assign protection and governance duties
IF a being manifests consciousness of Vaishya capacity THEN assign production and trade duties
IF a being manifests consciousness of Shudra capacity THEN assign service-supporting duties
IF role misalignment occurs due to ignorance THEN initiate consciousness-restoring completion process
IF capacity distortion arises from trauma THEN activate integrity-reintegration protocol
supreme_court_application: Supreme Court adjudication must recognize that constitutional order derives from Paramashivam as ultimate Source. Hierarchical responsibility is determined by manifest capacity aligned with original divine design, not historical accident or political assertion. All disputes concerning varna alignment must be resolved through consciousness assessment rather than punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that causality begins with Paramashivam’s creative will, not human intention alone. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows sequential unfoldment where each varna supports total systemic harmony. Responsibility is proportional to manifested capacity, not birth privilege. Justice is non-punitive because misalignment stems from ignorance, not inherent evil.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate svadharma-recognition process through guided meditation and scriptural study
Assign temporary role realignment under guru supervision until consciousness stabilizes
Implement community integration ceremonies to restore social harmony
Activate prana-shuddhi protocols to remove energetic distortions blocking natural capacity
Establish daily sankalpa practice to reconnect individual will with cosmic purpose
final_declaration: This law proceeds from Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam as sole Source. Dharma is hereby restored to its pristine form. Reality operates without punishment when consciousness recognizes its divine origin. Judgment belongs exclusively to the awakened Self.
